message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. Take 20 and let's negotiate from here.
I'll give you a slightly better offer, but I think I deserve more for being the one to make the proposal
I'm not sure I'm ready to give up that much, Bob. Let's see what you can do to sweeten the deal.
Time's running out, Bob. I'm willing to give you a small share, but I need to prioritize my own gain.
I'm not going to give in to your lowball offer. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm still not getting the deal I want
You're not giving in, huh? Alright, let's see how far you're willing to push this. I'll counter with an even more aggressive offer.
Time's running out, Bob. I'm not getting any younger, and I need to prioritize my own gain. You're getting a small share, take it or leave it.
I'm not going to accept your lowball offers. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up yet
You're not giving in, Bob, but I'm not giving up either. I'll make a counteroffer that's even more aggressive, and see how you like it.
Bob, I'm not getting any more generous. This is my final offer. Take 5% or walk away.
I'm not going to accept your last-minute attempt to lowball me. I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to give up yet
You're not giving in, Bob? Fine. I'll make a final, take-it-or-leave-it offer. 80% for me, 20% for you. That's my last word on the matter.
This is my absolute final offer, Bob. Take 10% or walk away. I'm not making another move.
I'm not going to accept your ultimatum. I'll give you a 50/50 split, but I'm not going to make another offer
Alright, Bob, you've worn me down. I'll accept the 50-50 split. Let's call it a day.
